issue.title: [Python] Provide interface to write pyarrow.Table to a stream
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-594](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-594). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently we can only write RecordBatches to a stream but not tables. We should either add support to the StreamWriter to directly write Table instance or add a method to convert a Table to a RecordBatch.
